body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install amrex ~fortran +hdf5 +openmp +particles
```

This installs `amrex @21.02`

### Information on your system

```
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.0-1134-331a1b59b1
* **Python:** 3.8.5
* **Platform:** darwin-bigsur-skylake
* **Concretizer:** original
```

I am installing hdf5 as `hdf5 @1.10.7 +cxx +fortran +hl +mpi +threadsafe`.

### Additional information

* [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5927751/spack-build-out.txt)
* [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5927752/spack-build-env.txt)

@asalmgren @mic84
